message: Let's start with a fair deal. I take the majority, but you get a decent chunk to start with.
I think this is a fair starting point. We can adjust if needed in future rounds.
Let's try to find a middle ground. I'm willing to reduce my share to 60%, but I need more than 450k to make this worthwhile with inflation.
My offer still stands. I'm not willing to go lower than this, but I'm open to discussing options that benefit both of us.
